title: US operation in Venezuela: Trump's 'America First' now runs through Caracas

title: With Maduro abduction, Trump flexes muscles and sends world a message
subhead: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro was abducted by US special forces. He is to stand trial before a federal court in New York on charges of 'narcoterrorism conspiracy.' Donald Trump has announced that the US plans to 'run' Venezuela up until a 'proper transition' and to exploit its oil reserves.

title: Several femicides mark the end of 2025 in France
subhead: A man was taken in for questioning on January 1 after police discovered his partner's body in their yard in Nantes. In Lille, two femicide cases cast a shadow over the year-end holidays, reflecting a rise in the number of women killed by their partners or ex-partners.
